dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to disturb the peace of the ethereal realm?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is a rare commodity here. Proceed with caution.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace and mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is but an illusion in these haunted lands. What do you truly seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish to understand the mysteries of the spectral plane.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mysteries are not easily unraveled, mortal. Beware what you wish for.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid to face the unknown.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery is futile in the face of the unknown. Turn back now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to claim the power of the ethereal haunt.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power corrupts, as do the shadows. Are you prepared for the consequences?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek only to harness this power for good.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intentions matter little in this realm. Beware your desires.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will do whatever it takes to gain power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ambition blinds mortals to the true cost. Prepare for the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to challenge the spirits of the spectral plane.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge is met with resistance in these haunted grounds. Do you dare?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no conflict, I simply seek a worthy opponent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict is the nature of the spectral realm. Prepare for what lies ahead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no spirits, let the challenge begin!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fearlessness is foolishness in these ghostly lands. Surrender to the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with the spectral beings, I shall depart.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Departure is wise, for the ethereal realm holds dangers beyond your comprehension.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I heed your warning and shall leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your wisdom shines amid the ignorance. Depart in peace, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall not be swayed by fear, I will stay and explore.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear makes way for folly. Stay and face the consequences of your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand to know why the spectral haunt lingers in this realm!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demanding brings naught but fleeting answers in this ethereal domain. Choose your next words carefully.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek understanding, not demands. Please enlighten me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is a rare gift among mortals. Proceed cautiously on this path.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave until I have my answers!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness begets only sorrow. Remain here and face the fate you seek.
